metadata.dc:description: Past and present in professional activity. In times of crisis the author looks back to pose the professional activity problems, not only for dentists but in general, the university graduated, based on ethics, which is apparently disappearing nowadays.
metadata.dc:title: Ejercicio profesional: ayer y hoy.
[Professional practice: yesterday and today].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista del Museo de la Facultad de Odontologia de Buenos Aires
